author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4786: Add sized scheduled thread pool to ensure scheduled thread pools do not eat up memory as the JDK pools is unbounded. Fixed throttler and delayer to use thread pool profile so end user can customize core pool size with these EIPs.
